p: The FSNetwork-TTW model showed a higher performance in both training and testing phase than the CDC baseline ensemble model, FluSight-unweighted_avg. This multi-model ensemble contained forecasts from 28 models submitted to the FluSight competition in 2017/2018. While some of these 28 models submitted to the CDC were or contained versions of the 21 models in our performance-based FluSight Network multi-model ensemble, over two-thirds of the models submitted to the CDC were not represented in the FluSight Network components. In 2017/2018, the FSNetwork-TTW model earned an average forecast score of 0.337 while the FluSight-unweighted_avg model earned an average forecast score of 0.321 ( Fig 4).
